sections.heading: Witnesses; answer subjecting to civil liability; not privileged
sections.text: A witness is not excused from answering a question upon the mere ground that he would be thereby subject to a civil liability.SourceR.S.1867, Code § 336, p. 450;R.S.1913, § 7901;C.S.1922, § 8843;C.S.1929, § 20-1209;R.S.1943, § 25-1209.
